1 // grabs the path, the robot model, the collision box and publishes it in the planning __HAVE_SPECULATION_SAFE_VALUE
2 
3 // if enabled, use rviz visual tools
4 
5 // maybe also handle the map update and the collision objects
6 
7 #include <iauv_motion_planner/Scene.h>
8 #include <shape_msgs/Mesh.h>
9 
10 namespace iauv_motion_planner
11 {
12 
13  Scene::Scene()
14  {
15  visual_tools_ = std::make_shared<rviz_visual_tools::RvizVisualTools>("world_ned", "/iauv_scene");
16 
17  counter = 0;
18 
19  marker_.type = visualization_msgs::Marker::MESH_RESOURCE;
20  marker_.header.frame_id = "world_ned";
21  marker_.mesh_resource = "package://iauv_commander/resources/g1000.dae";
22  marker_.scale.x = marker_.scale.y = marker_.scale.z = 1;
23  marker_.color.r = marker_.color.g = marker_.color.b = 1;
24  marker_.color.a = 0.5;
25 
26  // move this timer to draw path and compute
27  timer = nh_.createTimer(ros::Duration(0.1), &Scene::animatePath, this, false, false);
28 
29  subPath = nh_.subscribe("/iauv_motion_planner/path", 1, &Scene::pathCb, this);
30 
31  std::cout << "scene instace created\n";
32  }
33 
34  Scene::~Scene()
35  {
36  std::cout << "destroying scene obj\n";
37  visual_tools_->deleteAllMarkers();
38 
39  visual_tools_->trigger();
40  }
41 
42  void Scene::pathCb(const nav_msgs::PathConstPtr &msg)
43  {
44  std::cout << "scene received path, drawing it ---->\n";
45  drawPath(*msg);
46  }
47 
48  void Scene::animatePath(const ros::TimerEvent &event)
49  {
50  if (counter < path_.poses.size())
51  {
52  marker_.pose = path_.poses[counter].pose;
53  visual_tools_->publishMarker(marker_);
54  counter++;
55  }
56  else
57  {
58  counter = 0;
59  }
60  visual_tools_->trigger();
61  }
62 
63  void Scene::drawPath(nav_msgs::Path path)
64  {
65  path_ = path;
66  visual_tools_->deleteAllMarkers();
67  EigenSTL::vector_Vector3d puntos;
68  std::vector<rviz_visual_tools::colors> colors;
69  int i = 0;
70  counter = 0;
71 
72  for (auto posestmp : path_.poses)
73  {
74  puntos.push_back({posestmp.pose.position.x, posestmp.pose.position.y, posestmp.pose.position.z});
75  colors.push_back(colorlist_.at(i++ % colorlist_.size()));
76  visual_tools_->publishArrow(posestmp.pose, rviz_visual_tools::RED, rviz_visual_tools::LARGE);
77  }
78 
79  visual_tools_->publishPath(puntos, colors, 0.05);
80 
81  // Don't forget to trigger the publisher!
82  visual_tools_->trigger();
83  timer.start();
84  }
85 
86 }
